frontmatter.title: Kevin Roose, The New York Times
frontmatter.subtitle: Presented by the Initiative for Digital Public Infrastructure at UMass Amherst
frontmatter.author: Initiative for Digital Public Infrastructure
frontmatter.excerpt: We welcome Kevin Roose to the podcast — tech reporter for The New York Times and thorn in the side of Facebook — to talk to us about how platforms' laser focus on growth resulted in building a misinformation ecosystems and algorithms that they don't really understand. Kevin and Ethan talk about what's really the healthiest social media platform of them all, and what Wall Street-style regulation might look like for major platforms. Visit the episode page for show notes and a full transcription of the interview.
